title: <map>
description: The `<map>` HTML element is used with `<area>` elements to define an image map, which allows clickable areas within an image to be associated with different hyperlinks or actions.
content: The element that is used to define an image map, which is a clickable area on an image. The `<map>` element contains `<area>` elements that specify the shapes and coordinates of the clickable regions, allowing parts of the image to act as links.
